job_details.Vacaturetitel: Big Data Engineer for AI Training
job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Outlier helps the world's most innovative companies improve their AI models by providing human feedback. Are you an experienced software engineer who would like to lend your coding expertise to train AI models?
       We partner with organizations to train AI large language models, helping cutting-edge generative AI models write better code. Projects typically include discrete, highly variable problems that involve engaging with these models as they learn to code. There is no requirement for previous AI experience.
       About the opportunity:
          + Outlier is looking for talented coders to help train generative artificial intelligence models
          + This freelance opportunity is remote and hours are flexible, so you can work whenever is best for you
       You may contribute your expertise by
          + Crafting and answering questions related to computer science in order to help train AI models
          + Evaluating and ranking code generated by AI models
job_details.full_text:
Big Data Engineer for AI Training

Outlier helps the world's most innovative companies improve their AI models by providing human feedback. Are you an experienced software engineer who would like to lend your coding expertise to train AI models?
       We partner with organizations to train AI large language models, helping cutting-edge generative AI models write better code. Projects typically include discrete, highly variable problems that involve engaging with these models as they learn to code. There is no requirement for previous AI experience.
       About the opportunity:
          + Outlier is looking for talented coders to help train generative artificial intelligence models
          + This freelance opportunity is remote and hours are flexible, so you can work whenever is best for you
       You may contribute your expertise by
          + Crafting and answering questions related to computer science in order to help train AI models
          + Evaluating and ranking code generated by AI models

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses on using AI models to write better code and evaluating AI-generated code, which aligns with the use of AI tools to enhance productivity rather than the core development or engineering of AI models themselves. There is no mention of core AI development tasks like algorithm design, model training, fine-tuning, or MLOps, which are central to ML Engineer and GenAI Engineer roles. The role is described as 'Big Data Engineer for AI Training' but the tasks involve 'crafting and answering questions' and 'evaluating and ranking code', which are more akin to data annotation or quality assurance for AI training data rather than engineering. The description explicitly states 'no requirement for previous AI experience', further distancing it from specialized AI engineering roles.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'help train AI models' and 'engaging with these models as they learn to code' implies interaction with and contribution to the training process of AI models, even if not directly building them.
The phrase 'Crafting and answering questions related to computer science in order to help train AI models' describes a task that directly contributes to the data used for training AI models.
job_tasks.phrase: Crafting and answering questions related to computer science in order to help train AI models

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Evaluating and ranking code generated by AI models' is a form of model evaluation and feedback, which is a crucial part of the AI model development and improvement lifecycle.
job_tasks.phrase: Evaluating and ranking code generated by AI models

job_tasks.justification: The description mentions 'experienced software engineer' and 'lend your coding expertise', indicating a need for software development skills, though the application of these skills is focused on training AI rather than building user-facing applications.
The phrase 'talented coders' directly refers to individuals with software development capabilities.

soft_skills.phrase: no requirement for previous AI experience
